rows.label: qst002201_msg0002
rows.name:
Oh, you're not one of the locals...
Thank goodness.

rows.label: qst002201_msg0004
rows.name:
My mother was orphaned in the war,
and she raised me here in Acedia.

rows.label: qst002201_msg0005
rows.name:
So although I'm Gulan, I've
never actually been to Gula...

rows.label: qst002201_msg0006
rows.name:
Lately there's something that's been
bothering me... I feel like someone's
spying on me all the time.

rows.label: qst002201_msg0007
rows.name:
I was accepted into the Choir of Acedia
just recently, and I think that's when
it started...

rows.label: qst002201_msg0008
rows.name: Well, it's driving me a little crazy...

rows.label: qst002201_msg0009
rows.name:
If you would be so kind, might I ask
you to help me identify the culprit?

rows.label: qst002201_msg0010
rows.name:
Y-you would? Really?
Thank you so much!

rows.label: qst002201_msg0011
rows.name:
Um...maybe you could start by asking
around among the locals?

rows.label: qst002201_msg0012
rows.name:
Just bring me up casually in
conversation, and see if anyone
knows anything.

rows.label: qst002201_msg0013
rows.name:
I'm sure the culprit must be someone
living in this city. Otherwise, I have no
idea why they would...

rows.label: qst002201_msg0014
rows.name:
I'll be waiting right here, so please
let me know if you find anything.

rows.label: qst002201_msg0101
rows.name:
Could you go and talk to the
townsfolk, and look for clues
on who's spying on me?

rows.label: qst002201_msg0102
rows.name:
I suppose I could be imagining the
whole thing, but I can't shake the
feeling I'm being watched...

rows.label: qst002201_msg0103
rows.name:
Could it have anything to do with my
joining the Choir of Acedia?
